entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:49 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 2:19 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: E 21 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
